rawConfiguration.text:
# DevOps Summit Melbourne 2022
## Play Super Mario and WIN cool prizes
- Top 3 fastest players who complete the level
- Top 3 players who collect most coins AND completed the level in **1/2** the allowed time

widgets.title: Last 5 Games Live Stats - Coin and Time left

nrqlQueries.query: FROM SuperMarioStats SELECT max(numeric(totalCoins)*10) where gameEvent ='coin' and totalCoins is not null timeseries 5 seconds facet playerName since 5 minutes ago limit 5
FROM PageView SELECT count(*) SINCE 1 minutes ago TIMESERIES 5 seconds
FROM SuperMarioStats SELECT max(numeric(timeLeft)) where gameEvent ='coin' and totalCoins is not null timeseries 5 seconds facet playerName since 5 minutes ago limit 5

widgets.title: Live stats - Coin and Time left

nrqlQueries.query: SELECT max(numeric(totalCoins)) AS 'Max Coins Collected' FROM SuperMarioStats since 2 days ago

widgets.title: Live stats - Coin and Time left

nrqlQueries.query: FROM SuperMarioStats SELECT max(400 - numeric(timeLeft)) as 'Fastest Completion Time (Seconds)' where gameEvent = 'completedLevel' since 2 days ago
FROM SuperMarioStats SELECT sum(numeric(totalCoins) as 'coins collected')  where gameEvent = 'completedLevel' since 2 day ago
SELECT uniqueCount(playerId) AS 'Players' FROM SuperMarioStats since 2 days ago

widgets.title: Leaderboard - Fastest time to complete level - Prize for top 3

nrqlQueries.query: FROM SuperMarioStats SELECT max(numeric(timeLeft)) where gameEvent = 'completedLevel' facet  playerCompany, playerName since 2 days ago

widgets.title: Leaderboard  - Most By Coins collected and complete level in half allowed time - Prize for top 3

nrqlQueries.query: FROM SuperMarioStats SELECT max(numeric(totalCoins)) where gameEvent = 'completedLevel' and numeric(timeLeft) >= 200 facet  playerCompany, playerName since 2 days ago
FROM SuperMarioStats SELECT average(400 - numeric(timeLeft)) as seconds where gameEvent = 'completedLevel' facet playerCompany since 2 days ago
FROM SuperMarioStats SELECT average(numeric(totalCoins)) where gameEvent = 'completedLevel' facet playerCompany since 2 days ago
FROM SuperMarioStats SELECT uniqueCount(playerId) where gameEvent = 'death' OR gameEvent = 'completedLevel'  facet gameEvent since 2 days ago
